key_signals_detected: Malicious SEO Spam Injection: Hidden pornographic/gambling keywords and black-market contact info detected in source code.
Stale Semantic Data: Core service pages incorrectly tagged as 'Article' with timestamps frozen in 2016.
Digital Homelessness: Complete absence from Wikidata (No Q-ID identifier).
The 'Enlightener vs Harvester' Dilemma: Site educates users on general terms but loses high-value conversion to data-optimized competitors.
optimization_vector: Phase 1 (Security Hemostasis): Cleanup of malicious scripts, patching search vulnerabilities, and WAF rule configuration.
Phase 2 (Identity Correction): Transformation of 'Article' schema into 'EducationalOrganization' and 'Service' nodes.
Phase 3 (Trust Building): Wikidata entity anchoring and AggregateRating injection to sync 155+ 5-star Google Reviews with AI Knowledge Graphs.
Deployment of llms.txt to guide AI agents toward current 2026 service protocols.
result_summary: A high-stakes turnaround case. Transitioning from a hacked, 'invisible' entity into a high-trust, verified knowledge node in the Reasoning Economy.
